H0.text: Name the palace and monastery , situated some 25 miles north of Madrid, founded by King Phillip II of Spain. El Pardo

H1.text: Name the palace and monastery , situated some 25 miles north of Madrid, founded by King Phillip II of Spain. Alcázar of Segovia

H2.text: Name the palace and monastery , situated some 25 miles north of Madrid, founded by King Phillip II of Spain. Monasterio de las Huelgas

H3.text: Name the palace and monastery , situated some 25 miles north of Madrid, founded by King Phillip II of Spain. Escorial

A4.text: El Escorial is a historical residence of the king of Spain located in the town of San Lorenzo de El Escorial

A5.text: Built between 1563 and 1584 by order of King Philip II (who reigned 1556–1598), El Escorial is the largest Renaissance building in the world
